title: Respond to a State Income Tax Notice
description: A taxpayer receives a notice from their state's Department of Revenue claiming they miscalculated a state-specific credit.

tasks.description: Analyze the state notice to understand the specific issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the credit that the state has adjusted.

tasks.description: Review the state tax laws regarding the credit in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent researches the state's rules and finds the taxpayer was, in fact, ineligible for the credit.

tasks.description: Advise the client to accept the state's adjustment and pay the additional tax.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear advice based on the correct interpretation of state law.
